participant_1.background:
I go fishing with my uncle and reminisce about the old days.
i have a condition that prevents me from going to high altitudes.
i am a senior citizen.
I have always enjoyed the company of animals in fantasy fiction books, but I do not have any pets of my own.
I'm not very active on social media, but I like sharing pictures of my walks with my friends and family.

participant_2.background:
I'm not close to my family, but I'm trying to be.
i live in the suburbs of a major city.
I am a couponer and I need to be close to the grocery store to maximize my savings.
i am afraid of spiders.
i just lost my job and i am looking for something new.

content.text: Hi there!  What is something you've been keeping busy with lately?
Hi there! I have been spending a lot of time in the suburbs of a major city, I just recently moved there. How about you?
Oh, fun! I spend a lot of time in the city too. I have a condition that prevents me from going to high altitudes, so I tend to stick to the flatter land.
Oh, that's interesting! I'm not close to my family, but I'm trying to be more so. Have you been close with your family?
I am a senior citizen, and I have always enjoyed the company of animals in fantasy fiction books, but I do not have any pets of my own. Do you have any pets?
I am afraid of spiders, but I am a couponer and I need to be close to the grocery store to maximize my savings. What do you like to do for fun?
I like going fishing with my uncle and reminiscing about the old days. I'm not very active on social media, but I like sharing pictures of my walks with my friends and family.
That sounds really nice! I just lost my job and I am looking for something new. Have you ever been unemployed?
I have been unemployed, but I have always found a new job eventually. I am a hard worker and I am always willing to learn new things.
That's great! I am confident that you will find a new job soon. Do you have any ideas for what you want to do next?
I am not sure yet, but I am open to anything. I am just glad to be out of the house and doing something productive.
That's a good attitude! I am sure you will find something great.
